values: 富的；富有的；富裕的；有钱的；富含…的；富饶的；丰富的；非常有趣的；丰富多彩的；（气味）浓郁的；馥郁的；浓的；（色彩）深的；浓艳的；浓重的；鲜艳的；（食物）油腻的；容易让人感到饱的；（声音等）深沉浑厚的；低沉浑厚的；（土壤、土地）肥沃的；（珠宝等）昂贵的；华丽的；华贵的；富丽的；奢华的；富丽堂皇的；<非正式>（指某人的评论或批评）可笑的；有趣的；荒唐的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，语气强烈，指拥有大量金钱及财产。
普通用词，语气不如rich强烈，多指经济上富裕、社会地位稳固，很有身份，即有钱有势。

word_group.brief_definition: 丰富的经历；经验丰富；丰富的体验
富裕国家；富裕的国家；富饶之国
丰富的食物；油腻的食物；油腻食物
富含, 在...方面富有, 富有
富人和穷人；穷人和富人
某人（或富人）桌上的面包屑；残羹剩饭

bilingual.source: There's a rich old businessman in a small town.
bilingual.target: 在一个小镇上有一个富有的老商人。

bilingual.source: There was a rich old man in a house in town.
bilingual.target: 镇上一间房子里有一个富有的老人。

bilingual.source: She dreams of marrying a rich man.
bilingual.target: 她梦想嫁给一个富有的男人。

bilingual.source: She dreams of becoming a rich entrepreneur.
bilingual.target: 她梦想成为一个富有的企业家。

bilingual.source: He inherited a rich estate from his grandfather.
bilingual.target: 他从祖父那里继承了一份富有的遗产。

bilingual.source: This area is known for its rich cultural heritage.
bilingual.target: 这个地区以其富有的文化遗产而闻名。

bilingual.source: The rich businessman donated a large sum of money to charity.
bilingual.target: 那位富有的商人捐了一大笔钱给慈善机构。

bilingual.source: It's obvious that he is just trying to toady to the rich clients.
bilingual.target: 很明显他只是在对富有的客户拍马屁。

bilingual.source: It is a paradox that in such a rich country, there can be so much poverty.
bilingual.target: 在如此富有的国家中竟然会有这么多贫困，这是一个悖论。
他是一个富有的意大利商人。

list.abstract: Rich（英 [rɪtʃ]，美 [rɪtʃ]），英语单词。作形容词时，指有钱的、富的、丰饶的；作名词时，是人名。例句为He was a rich Italian merchant.（他是一个富有的意大利商人） 常见搭配有be rich in（富含）、rich experience（丰富的经历）。

李在元（Lee Jae-won、이재원），1998年2月16日出生于韩国，游戏ID：Rich，韩国《英雄联盟》电竞选手，司职上单，现效力于DRX战队。 Rich曾是一名《风暴英雄》职业选手，曾夺得三次《风暴英雄》国际冠军。后转型《英雄联盟》出道于韩国LCK联赛的Gen·G战队，并先后效力于DYN及NS战队。2020年，获得KeSPA杯亚军。2021年，获得LCK夏季赛四强。2022年4月20日，随V5战队获得英雄联盟2022LPL春季赛季军。11月22日，Rich发文称：与V5的合同终止。2023年11月30日，DIG官宣和Rich续约。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was rich, I sent 10,000 pairs of crocs to children in Africa. Why, to make them less cool?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我富有的时候，我寄了一万双洞洞鞋给非洲的儿童。为什么，让他们变丑吗?

yingyinNormal.en: All his rich mates, they get to live. And anyone he thinks is worth saving, he's keeping them safe. Whether they agree with him or not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他所有富有的合作伙伴都能生存下来。然后他觉得谁有利用价值，他就会保他们平安。不管他们是否认同他。

yingyinNormal.en: Rich. Yes, sir. Get out. Alright.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里奇 在, 长官出去 好的

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, so you found a rich client now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你现在找到有钱的客户了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my god! A treasure chest! I'm rich!
yingyinNormal.zh: 天呐，一个财宝箱！我发财了！

yingyinNormal.en: Cry? I just found a talking puppy, I'm rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哭？我发现一只会说话的狗，我发了。

yingyinNormal.en: So it's okay for Dan to date someone rich, though?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你就允许丹和上层富家女约会？

yingyinNormal.en: Level three, and she thinks she's rich. What a newb.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才3级就觉得自己发财了，真是个新手。

yingyinNormal.en: I got that email from Rich yesterday. He's really good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我昨天收到了瑞奇的电子邮件，这是非常不错的。

yingyinNormal.en: Genocide. But random, dispassionate, fair to rich and poor alike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 屠杀。但是随机，公正，不分贫富。

yingyinNormal.en: You guys said you wanted to get rich. Now you're rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们说想变有钱，现在你们有钱了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, from time to time, I notarize banking documents for Raj. The Koothrappalis aren't just rich, they're richie rich rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时不时地我要替拉杰公证一下账户记录，库萨帕里家不仅是有钱，而是超超超有钱。

yingyinNormal.en: The government will then send Sacks Industry a blank check and I'm going to be rich, like, stupid rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后政府就将会给萨克斯集团， 一张任我填写的支票，之后我就会变富有， 非常的富有。

yingyinNormal.en: There is no nobility in poverty. I have been a rich man and I have been a poor man. And I choose rich every time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贫贱的人没有高尚可言。我曾经发达过也曾经潦倒过，但两者相比，我会选择发达。

yingyinNormal.en: I want you to deal with your problems by becoming rich!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你们用用财富来解决自己的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: What is that? It means, it's like the fullest and most rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: "本质"是什么意思？非常的饱满，非常的丰富

yingyinNormal.en: It's not gonna make you rich and it's not gonna make you poor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会让你更富，也不会让你更穷。

yingyinNormal.en: Meanwhile, he thinks he's getting shit rich, which he is, on paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这时他以为自己要发大财了，没错 在纸面上是赚了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well you just gotta listen to the greats then. Buddy Rich, Jo Jones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就多听经典吧，巴迪·瑞奇，乔·琼斯。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me? I had him out of wedlock, so I'm single. And I'm very rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说什么? 是我的私生子，所以呢，我单身而且超有钱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 丰富；富裕；肥沃；浓烈

word_family.mean: adj. 有钱的；富的；丰饶的；丰富的；盛产的；丰产的；（话语）逗人的；荒唐的；使人气愤的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of money or valuable possessions

examination_example.sentence: A flashing set of healthy and clean, regular "pearly whites" was a rare sight in Victorian society, the preserve of the super-<highlight>rich</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在维多利亚时代，一口健康、干净、整齐的“珍珠白（牙齿）”是非常罕见的，只有超级富豪才能拥有。

examination_example.sentence: The Nobels were, of course, themselves set up by a very <highlight>rich</highlight> individual who had decided what he wanted to do with his own money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，诺贝尔奖本身就是当时一位有钱人设立的，在设立前他早已决定该如何处置自己的钱了。

examination_example.sentence: In many <highlight>rich</highlight> countries average wages in the state sector are higher than in the private one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多富裕国家，国营部门的平均工资要高于私营部门。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>rich</highlight> meal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 昂贵的一餐。

examination_example.sentence: They're also from birds that live on farms using regenerative agriculture-special techniques to cultivate <highlight>rich</highlight> soils.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们也来自于那些生活在使用再生农业技术来培育肥沃土壤的农场中的鸟类。

sense_info_list.en: used to describe one's opinions when that person has the same bad qualities as the person they are criticizing
containing a lot of exciting events or experiences and therefore very interesting

word_usage.usage: rich前加定冠词the，可用来表示“富人”这一类人，谓语动词要用复数，如：The rich are not always happy.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 肥沃的; 富饶的; (矿产)丰富的
阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of money or valuable possessions

examination_example.sentence: It is beneficial to poor as well as <highlight>rich</highlight> communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它对穷人和富人都有好处。

examination_example.sentence: They show a difference between <highlight>rich</highlight> and poor nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们显示了富国和穷国之间的差异。

examination_example.sentence: Narrowing the existing gap between the <highlight>rich</highlight> and the poor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 缩小现有的贫富差距。

sense_info_list.zh: 肥沃的; 富饶的; (矿产)丰富的

examination_example.sentence: Application of more nitrogen-<highlight>rich</highlight> fertilizers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 施用更多的富氮肥料。

examination_example.sentence: The Caribbean islands are divided into two worlds, a <highlight>rich</highlight> one and a poor one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加勒比海岛屿被分为两个世界，一个富裕的世界和一个贫穷的世界。

examination_example.sentence: They must offer higher yields but use less water, nitrogen-<highlight>rich</highlight> fertilizers or other inputs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们必须提供更高的产量，但使用更少的水、富氮化肥或其他投入。

sense_info_list.en: containing a lot of exciting events or experiences and therefore very interesting
sense_info_list.zh: 阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的

word_usage.usage:
the rich指“富人”，其谓语动词要用复数形式。
示例：有钱人并不总是幸福的。
误 The rich is not always happy.
正 The rich are not always happy.

“大量含有...的”用be rich in表达。
示例：这片土地矿产丰富。
误 The land has rich minerals.
正 The land is rich in minerals.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的
肥沃的; 富饶的; (矿产)丰富的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 富人和穷人；穷人和富人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of money or valuable possessions

examination_example.sentence: In other words, the <highlight>rich</highlight> get richer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，富人越来越富。

examination_example.sentence: But forests are also changing in <highlight>rich</highlight> Western countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在富有的西方国家，森林也在发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: But in recent years, housing prices have skyrocketed, the region's <highlight>rich</highlight> and poor have segregated, and middle-class jobs have disappeared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但近年来，房价飙升，该地区的富人和穷人被隔离开来，中产阶级的工作消失了。

sense_info_list.en: containing a lot of exciting events or experiences and therefore very interesting
sense_info_list.zh: 阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的
肥沃的; 富饶的; (矿产)丰富的

examination_example.sentence: Her <highlight>rich</highlight> and filling-fruit pies quickly got the racers' attention, and the village gained some fame as a result.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她做的水果馅饼味道很浓，很快引起了参赛者的注意，结果这个村子也因此名声大噪。

examination_example.sentence: In our stimulation-<highlight>rich</highlight> world, it seems unrealistic that boredom could occur at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们这个充满刺激的世界里，无聊的发生似乎根本是不现实的。

word_usage.usage:
“大量含有...的”用be rich in表达。
示例：这片土地矿产丰富。
误 The land has rich minerals.
正 The land is rich in minerals.

the rich指“富人”，其谓语动词要用复数形式。
示例：有钱人并不总是幸福的。
误 The rich is not always happy.
正 The rich are not always happy.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 贵重的; 昂贵的; 华丽的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 丰富；富裕；肥沃；浓烈

word_family.mean: adj. 有钱的；富的；丰饶的；丰富的；盛产的；丰产的；（话语）逗人的；荒唐的；使人气愤的

examination_example.sentence: Accordingly, newspapers were read almost only by <highlight>rich</highlight> people in politics or the trades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相应地，报纸几乎只被政界或商界的富人阅读。

examination_example.sentence: But no matter how <highlight>rich</highlight> they were, Dawson was never comfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是不管他们多么富有，道森从来都不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: About 100 of these stayed <highlight>rich</highlight> men for the rest of their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中大约有100人在余生都是富人。

examination_example.sentence: For Western designers China and its <highlight>rich</highlight> culture have long been an inspiration for Western creative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于西方设计师来说，中国及其丰富的文化长期以来一直是西方创意的灵感来源。

examination_example.sentence: By translating the <highlight>rich</highlight> and humorous text of Love's Labor's Lost into BSL, Definitely Theatre creates a new interpretation of Shakespeare's comedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过将《爱的徒劳》丰富而幽默的文本翻译成生物脚本语言，德菲尼特利剧院对莎士比亚的喜剧进行了新的诠释。

examination_example.sentence: However, they are <highlight>rich</highlight> in vitamin C.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，它们富含维生素C。

examination_example.sentence: On the other occasion, they ate a <highlight>rich</highlight> morning meal about two hours before they started walking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一次，他们在开始行走前大约两个小时吃了一顿丰富的早餐。

sense_info_list.zh: 贵重的; 昂贵的; 华丽的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 肥沃的; 富饶的; 富含...的; 丰富的
阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 丰富；富裕；肥沃；浓烈

word_family.mean: adj. 有钱的；富的；丰饶的；丰富的；盛产的；丰产的；（话语）逗人的；荒唐的；使人气愤的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 富裕国家；富裕的国家；富饶之国
丰富的经历；经验丰富；丰富的体验
丰富的食物；油腻的食物；油腻食物

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of money or valuable possessions

examination_example.sentence: This man offered much money to the school, I thought he must be a <highlight>rich</highlight> man.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人给学校提供了很多钱，我想他一定是个富人。

examination_example.sentence: It showed that the children who had worked hard in childhood had a <highlight>richer</highlight> and a happier future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明在童年时期努力工作的孩子有一个更丰富、更幸福的未来。

examination_example.sentence: He took off his expensive watch to hide the fact that he was <highlight>rich</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他脱下昂贵的手表，以掩盖他很富有的事实。

sense_info_list.zh: 肥沃的; 富饶的; 富含...的; 丰富的

examination_example.sentence: They carry <highlight>rich</highlight> information about the life of Chinese people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们承载着关于中国人生活的丰富信息。

examination_example.sentence: Besides water, kids need plenty of calcium (钙) to grow strong bones (骨头), and milk is <highlight>rich</highlight> in it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了水，孩子还需要大量的钙来长出强壮的骨骼，而且牛奶富含钙。

examination_example.sentence: As with other languages, American English is <highlight>rich</highlight> in expressions that come from animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和其他语言一样，美国英语也有大量来自动物的表达。

sense_info_list.en: interesting because full of diversity or complexity
sense_info_list.zh: 阅历丰富的; 丰富多彩的

examination_example.sentence: China is a country with a long and <highlight>rich</highlight> history.It has many colorful holidays and festivals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国是一个历史悠久而丰富的国家。它有许多丰富多彩的假期和节日。

examination_example.sentence: Let's take a look at the <highlight>rich</highlight> history of the color purple.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们来看看紫色的丰富历史。

examination_example.sentence: China is a country with a long history and <highlight>rich</highlight> culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国是一个历史悠久、文化丰富的国家。

examination_example.sentence: The smeared colours looked glorious, like <highlight>rich</highlight>, thick frosting on a cake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 涂抹的颜色看起来很漂亮，就像蛋糕上浓郁的糖霜。

examination_example.sentence: And she used the dragon fruit to show the <highlight>rich</highlight> colors in autumn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她用火龙果来展示秋天丰富的色彩。

sense_info_list.en: containing a lot of fat, butter, eggs, etc. and making you feel full quickly

examination_example.sentence: Stopping eating <highlight>rich</highlight> food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 别再吃油腻的食物了。

word_usage.usage:
the rich指“富人”，其谓语动词要用复数形式。
示例：有钱人并不总是幸福的。
误 The rich is not always happy.
正 The rich are not always happy.

“大量含有...的”用be rich in表达。
示例：这片土地矿产丰富。
误 The land has rich minerals.
正 The land is rich in minerals.
